name: Deadline (itch) (Onur Kalkan, İlkiz Tırtıl, berkkan.c, serraguzeller, Cansuup)
name_original: Deadline (itch) (Onur Kalkan, İlkiz Tırtıl, berkkan.c, serraguzeller, Cansuup)
description:
2019 Istanbul Alibeykoy, its 2 am and a poor student need to finish the assignments before the deadline hits.

Game Design - Cansu Polat, Serra Güzeller

Gameplay Programmer - Onur Kalkan

2D Artist - Cansu Polat

UI Programmer - Berkkan Cansız

Sound Design - Ilkız Tırtıl
